item.title: Packaging Pre-built Binaries with Nix Flake
item.description: Today, I wanted to have postgrest in my Nix environment so I hopped on the nixpkgs search, only to find that the existing versions are quite old, as well as having to build the project from source. Which personally, I didn’t want to do due to my limited LTE bandwidth. Why should I? postgrest has pre-built, static binaries in its GitHub releases page. Is there any way I can make use of that instead?
